sentences.en: Antibiotic vial filling and sealing machine screw filling machine. --- Pharmacy Use.
sentences.cn: 抗生素针剂充填机,铝盖冯瓶机. ( 药厂 用)

sentences.en: Apply one vial of IRS at night after cleansing and toning for 14 consecutive days.
sentences.cn: 在晚间,卸妆、清洁及使用调肤水后,一次使用一整瓶IRS,连续使用14天.

sentences.en: Evidence also arrives in difficult-to-identify forms like a carved statuette, a belt, or a small vial of medicinal powder.
sentences.cn: 到这儿的证物有时是种难以辨认的形式，像是刻过的雕像，皮带或是一小瓶药粉。

sentences.en: He handed Reitsch a vial of poison for herself and one for Greim.
sentences.cn: 他给莱契一瓶毒药,另一瓶叫她给格莱姆.

sentences.en: Immerse the end of the column in a vial of acetone and check bubbles.
sentences.cn: 将柱尾端入丙酮中检查气泡.

sentences.en: Instinctively, his eyes moved to the transparent black vial sitting on the cigarette - scalded plastic shelf.
sentences.cn: 本能地, 他的眼神转移到透明的黑色小瓶坐于香烟烫伤的塑料架子上.

sentences.en: Objective : To establish bacterial endotoxin test of vial.
sentences.cn: 目的: 建立药用西林瓶细菌内毒素检查法.

sentences.en: Packed for Xiaotong vial packaging or packaging, which is the ideal packaging automatic oil production equipment.
sentences.cn: 分装为小桶包装或小瓶包装, 是小包装油的理想自动生产设备.

sentences.en: Packing: 0.36 g per vial, 6 vials per box.
sentences.cn: 包装: 每瓶重零点三六克, 每盒六瓶.

sentences.en: Results: the liquid that had soaked vial not influence the bacterial endotoxin test.
sentences.cn: 结果: 药用西林瓶浸泡液不干扰细菌内毒素试验.

sentences.en: The salt is in the vial.

trans.tran_cn: 小瓶，小玻璃瓶，药水瓶，郁积的情绪（如愤怒等）
trans.tran_en: a very small bottle used for medicine, perfume etc
